Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: feedback from my teacher helped me greatly improve my work as I was better able to meet the set criteria for the assignment. GenAI impacted my learning less directly by providing me some feedback which helped me modify my work before showing a teacher

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from my teacher felt more personal and i felt more accomplished with their feedback compared to GenAI, which felt more shallow

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI provides quicker feedback and is more accessible
